summary: Adds a ring which allows you to slow time by equipping it.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a ring which allows you to slow time by equipping it. Requires MCM (via SkyUI or standalone) to access the configuration menu. After selecting a value for percentage to slow time in the menu, the ring will be added to your inventory. Otherwise ring can be acquired via console commands.

This was created in response to a request by malaki360 on the nexus forums. Hope you enjoy it!
author: Zumonaki
